project.description: The Jira project key to get components for

tools.name: jira_get_project_statuses
tools.description: Get all statuses for a specific Jira project

project.description: The Jira project key to get statuses for

tools.name: jira_create_ticket_with_parent
tools.description: Create a new Jira ticket with a parent relationship

issueType.description: The type of issue to create (e.g., Bug, Story, Task)

project.description: The Jira project key to create the ticket in

parentKey.description: The key of the parent ticket

tools.name: jira_create_ticket_basic
tools.description: Create a new Jira ticket with basic fields (project, issue type, summary, description)

issueType.description: The type of issue to create (e.g., Bug, Story, Task)

summary.description: The ticket summary/title (e.g., Fix login issue)

project.description: The Jira project key to create the ticket in (e.g., PROJ)

description.description: The ticket description. Supports Jira markup syntax: h2. for headings, *text* for bold, {code}text{code} for inline code, * for bullet lists

tools.name: jira_create_ticket_with_json
tools.description: Create a new Jira ticket with custom fields using JSON configuration

project.description: The Jira project key to create the ticket in (e.g., PROJ)

fieldsJson.description: JSON object containing ticket fields in Jira format (e.g., {"summary": "Ticket Summary", "description": "Ticket Description", "issuetype": {"name": "Task"}, "priority": {"name": "High"}}), Supports Jira markup syntax: h2. for headings, *text* for bold, {code}text{code} for inline code, * for bullet lists

tools.name: jira_update_description
tools.description: Update the description of a Jira ticket. Supports Jira markup syntax: h2. for headings, *text* for bold, {code}text{code} for inline code, * for bullet lists

description.description: The new description text (supports Jira markup: h2. headings, *bold*, {code}code{code}, * lists)

key.description: The Jira ticket key to update

tools.name: jira_update_ticket_parent
tools.description: Update the parent of a Jira ticket. Can be used for setting up epic relationships and parent-child relationships for subtasks

key.description: The Jira ticket key to update

parentKey.description: The key of the new parent ticket

tools.name: jira_update_ticket
tools.description: Update a Jira ticket using JSON parameters following the standard Jira REST API format

params.description: JSON object containing update parameters in Jira format (e.g., {"fields": {"summary": "New Summary", "parent": {"key": "PROJ-123"}}})

key.description: The Jira ticket key to update

tools.name: jira_update_field
tools.description: Update field(s) in a Jira ticket. When using field names (e.g., 'Dependencies'), updates ALL fields with that name. When using custom field IDs (e.g., 'customfield_10091'), updates only that specific field.

field.description: The field to update. Use field name (e.g., 'Dependencies') to update ALL fields with that name, or custom field ID (e.g., 'customfield_10091') to update specific field

value.description: The new value for the field(s)

key.description: The Jira ticket key to update

tools.name: jira_update_all_fields_with_name
tools.description: Update ALL fields with the same name in a Jira ticket. Useful when there are multiple custom fields with the same display name.

value.description: The new value for the fields

key.description: The Jira ticket key to update

tools.name: jira_get_all_fields_with_name
tools.description: Get all custom field IDs that have the same display name in a Jira project

tools.name: jira_execute_request
tools.description: Execute a custom HTTP GET request to Jira API with auth. Can be used to perform any jira get requests which are required auth.

url.description: The Jira API URL to execute

tools.name: jira_attach_file_to_ticket
tools.description: Attach a file to a Jira ticket from a local file path. The file will only be attached if a file with the same name doesn't already exist

name.description: The name of the file to attach

ticketKey.description: The Jira ticket key to attach the file to

contentType.description: The content type of the file (e.g., 'application/pdf', 'image/png'). If not provided, defaults to 'image/*'

filePath.description: Absolute path to the file on disk

tools.name: jira_get_transitions
tools.description: Get all available transitions(statuses, workflows) for a Jira ticket

key.description: The Jira ticket key to get transitions for

tools.name: jira_move_to_status
tools.description: Move a Jira ticket to a specific status (workflow, transition)

key.description: The Jira ticket key to move

tools.name: jira_move_to_status_with_resolution
tools.description: Move a Jira ticket to a specific status (workflow, transition) with resolution

key.description: The Jira ticket key to move

tools.name: jira_clear_field
tools.description: Clear (delete value) a specific field value in a Jira ticket

key.description: The Jira ticket key to clear field from

tools.name: jira_set_fix_version
tools.description: Set the fix version for a Jira ticket

fixVersion.description: The fix version name to set

key.description: The Jira ticket key to set fix version for

tools.name: jira_add_fix_version
tools.description: Add a fix version to a Jira ticket (without removing existing ones)

fixVersion.description: The fix version name to add

key.description: The Jira ticket key to add fix version to

tools.name: jira_set_priority
tools.description: Set the priority for a Jira ticket

key.description: The Jira ticket key to set priority for

tools.name: jira_remove_fix_version
tools.description: Remove a fix version from a Jira ticket

fixVersion.description: The fix version name to remove

key.description: The Jira ticket key to remove fix version from

tools.name: jira_download_attachment
tools.description: Download a Jira attachment by URL and save it as a file

tools.name: jira_get_fields
tools.description: Get all available fields for a Jira project

project.description: The Jira project key to get fields for

tools.name: jira_get_issue_types
tools.description: Get all available issue types for a specific Jira project

project.description: The Jira project key to get issue types for

tools.name: jira_get_field_custom_code
tools.description: Get the custom field code for a human friendly field name in a Jira project

tools.name: jira_get_issue_link_types
tools.description: Get all available issue link types/relationships in Jira

tools.description: Link two Jira issues with a specific relationship type
